description: Fell 2 Plane trees and one Weeping Ash.Prune 13 Plane trees  one Sycamore.Works:- (Trees viewed in an anti- clockwise direction around Square) T1 Plane - fellT2 Plane - fellT3 Plane - Crown thin by 40%.Reduce by 30% section growing at easterly angle over access road. T4 Plane - Crown thin by 40%.Check 3 large cavities in trunk approx. 18-24' up. T5 Plane - Crown thin by 40%. T6 Plane - Crown thin by 40%.Tidy up snags. T7 Plane - Crown thin by 40%. T8 Plane - Crown thin by 30%. T9 Plane - Crown thin by 30%.Tidy up snags. T10 Plane - Crown thin by 30%. T11 Plane - Crown reduce to make safe. T12 Plane - Crown thin by 40%.Tidy up snags. T13 Plane - Crown thin by 30%.Balance. T14 Plane - Crown thin by 40%.Check 2 cavities. T15 Plane - Crown thin by 30%. T16 Sycamore - Crown thin by 30%. T17 Weeping Ash.Fell.
decision_conditions: The work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendations of British Standard 3998 : 1966 'Tree Work'.
